name: Dragon Ascent
description: You soar upward and come crashing down towards a creature in range at tremendous speed. Make a melee attack roll, dealing 5d6 + MOVE flying damage on a hit. Any creature within 10 feet of the target must make a DEX save against your Move DC and take the same amount of damage on a failure, or half as much on a success. After activating this move, any attack roll that targets you until the beginning of your next turn is rolled with advantage.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 4d10 at level 5, 6d10 at level 10, and 8d12 at level 17.
